page.title: 02BAMFORD IN 1985
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF BAMFORD IS SITUATED IN THE HOPE VALLEY ALONG THE BANKS OF THE RIVER DERWENT.THE MAIN EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE IS AT THE OLD COTTON MILL , WHICH IS NOW USED TO MANUFACTURE MATERIALS FOR USE IN FURNACES , THE COMPANY IS CALLED CARBOLITE ABOVE THE VILLAGE IS BAMFORD EDGE IT IS NAMED AFTER THE VILLAGE BELOW IT.BAMFORD EDGE IS A CRAGGY OUTCROP OF MILLSTONE GRIT. IT IS USED A GREAT DEAL BY ROCK CLIMBERS DURING THE SUMMER. IT IS AT THE NORTHERN END OF OUR BLOCK. THERE IS A ROCK FEATURE MADE FROM MILLSTONE GRIT IT IS SHAPED LIKE A CANNON.IT HAS BEEN THERE FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS. LOTS OF PEOPLE ADMIRE IT. WE CAN SEE IT FROM OUR SCHOOL PLAY GROUND.
